data.fullContent: Six months into engineering school, Jack longed to do something more with his life. He had always been fascinated by computers and, ever since high school, had dreamed of working for a computer company. One day, he came up with the idea of starting his own business as a consultant. He decided that would be a perfect fit for his interests. He started his business immediately while also working part-time at a computer company. Three years later, he had made enough money to quit his part-time job and run his own company full-time.

q1.translation: 进入工程学院六个月后，杰克渴望做更多的事情。他一直对计算机着迷，从高中起就梦想着为一家计算机公司工作。
q1.front: Six months into engineering school, Jack longed to do something more with his life. He had always been fascinated by computers and, ever since high school, had dreamed of working for a computer company.
q1.content: Six months into engineering school, Jack longed to do ____ more with his ____. He had always been ____ by computers and, ever since high school, had ____ of working for a computer company.

q2.translation: 进入工程学院六个月后，杰克渴望做更多的事情。他一直对计算机着迷，从高中起就梦想着为一家计算机公司工作。有一天，他想到了自己做顾问的主意。他认为这完全符合他的兴趣。他在一家电脑公司做兼职的同时，立即开始了自己的事业。三年后，他赚到了足够的钱，辞掉了兼职工作，全职经营自己的公司。
q2.front: Six months into engineering school, Jack longed to do something more with his life. He had always been fascinated by computers and, ever since high school, had dreamed of working for a computer company.
q2.middle: One day, he came up with the idea of starting his own business as a consultant.
q2.ending: He decided that would be a perfect fit for his interests. He started his business immediately while also working part-time at a computer company. Three years later, he had made enough money to quit his part-time job and run his own company full-time.

options.sentence: Jack had many business ideas, but he knew he could turn them all into reality.
It was a bit too complicated to set up and he didn't know where to start.
One day, he came up with the idea of starting his own business as a consultant.
He grew his business until he was making more money than he ever dreamed possible.

Jack started the business while also working part-time at a computer company.
